messages.text:
*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=cf2495659384&repo=blog ***

go.blog: add content

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7436052

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.blog

nit: can you please add go.blog to build.golang.org.

Thanks for the reminder.
